titles.title: A bill to extend the authorization for the Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission.
Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission Reauthorization Act
Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission Reauthorization Act
Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission Reauthorization Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission Reauthorization Act
This bill extends the Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission through September 25, 2029.
